body:
If you have an internship or job opportunity at your company or know about some other good place, please comment with the following information:

-    Position title
-    Remote / Physical location
-    Duration
-    Stipend amount
-    Last date to apply

The top comment contains a table of currently known positions.

Position | Location | Stipend | Duration | Last date | Comment link
---|---|---|---|---|---
Software engineer CodeNation | | 33LPA | | | https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-689503123
Vision Deep Learning & AIOPs Engineer Cogknit| Bangalore|---|---|---|https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-669003619
Speech Deployment Engineer Cogknit| Bangalore|---|---|---|https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-669003619
Flutter app developer | remote | no bar | | | https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-636680723
Summer intern | - | - | - | - | https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-642112954
NPTEL python developer | - | - | - | - | https://github.com/PyJaipur/PyJaipur/issues/26#issuecomment-643181264

comment_data.body:
I am interested @akash-gupta94 for the Devops Management Position
Please tell me how to proceed?

Hey,

Can you please send us your Resume.

*Akash Gupta*

*Smaac Net Solutions Pvt. Ltd.*
*(Industry Specific Software Solutions)*
B-17, Institutional Area, Sector 32, Gurugram, Haryana 122021
P: 0124-4536812    M: +91 8149160099;
Email: akash@smaac.in    Web: www.smaac.in





On Tue, Mar 31, 2020 at 12:50 PM Anchal Agarwal <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

One of my friend is urgently looking for a part time/full time intern for a flutter based app development. Please connect if interested.
Stipend - No bar for good candidate.
Location - Remotely.

Hello,

We are not into App development.


Akash Gupta

That's ok @akash-gupta94 I think @ayushisaxena22050 was posting an opportunity available at her company.

This was mentioned in ILUGD volunteer call, so posting it here.

Company - Afrost.org
Job Designation - Summer interns
Contact Person - Satyakam Goswami
Email Id - satyaakam@gmail.com

From HydPy telegram group.

NPTEL is Hiring
We are looking for Python Developers. 
Job description: 
· Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or allied fields is required. Master’s degree preferred 
· Ability to learn new technologies quickly and adapt them to our development needs would be considered an asset. 
· 3+ years of experience in web development (backend), building REST APIs in Python 
· Have worked with an MVC framework 
· Experience in working with SQL databases 
· Comfortable with *nix operating systems and the command line in Linux, Mac, etc. 
· Have worked with Python and Flask and Flask-Restful · Have worked with Google App Engine, Heroku, or something similar 
· Have worked on open source projects on Github 
· Can be your own projects · Have worked with any of the following · NGINX, Apache, WSGI, Any load balancers 
· Have experience in solving complicated design problems when it comes to web development. 
This is a contract position from NPTEL, IIT Madras. If interested Please share your resume to recruit@onlinedegree.iitm.ac.in

Cogknit is looking to hire 2 engineers on an immediate basis for the following 2 roles.

   
 
Vision Deep Learning & AIOPs Engineer: Cogknit is looking to expand its AI deployment team and is looking to add engineers with experience & exposure to Computer Vision and Deep Learning frame-works & libraries. 2-4 years experience with exposure working with R&D/Researchers will be a bonus. You will be joining a high growth & high learning environment. Come along if you want to enjoy the ride. Exposure to AI/ML environments on AWS/Azure is a bonus

Exposure to Nvidia Tools like DeepStream, TensorRT will be a big plus. Following skills will be a necessity. Key Skills : Python/Java/SQL, TensorFlow/PyTorch, TensorFlow/Keras, Docker, Exposure to AI model Deployment, Kafka, RabbitMQ

Speech Deployment Engineer: Cogknit is looking to expand its AI deployment team and is looking to add engineers with experience & exposure to Speech Processing and Deep Learning frame-works & libraries. 2-4 years experience with exposure working with R&D/Researchers will be a bonus. You will be joining a high growth & high learning environment.  Exposure to AI/ML environments on AWS/Azure is a bonus 

Exposure to Nvidia Tools like DeepStream, TensorRT will be a big plus. Following skills will be a necessity. Knowledge of both TensorFlow & Espnet is a necessity. Python/Java/SQL, Pytorch, Docker, Exposure to AI Deployment, Kafka, RabbitMQ

Please reply to this comment if you would like to apply.

Hello PyJaipur/PyJaipur,

I want to apply for this position.
